alert.note: Alert for Escambia; Santa Rosa (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 17 at 10:26PM EDT until April 17 at 11:15PM EDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: The National Weather Service in Mobile has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Santa Rosa County in northwestern Florida... Northwestern Escambia County in northwestern Florida... * Until 1015 PM CDT. * At 926 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 8 miles southwest of Bratt, or 11 miles south of Atmore, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Pace, Milton, Century, Flomaton, Bagdad, Molino, Jay, Pea Ridge, Bratt, Floridatown and Point Baker. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
